headline: Warren Buffett Has 23% of Berkshire Hathaway's Portfolio Invested in 2 AI Stocks Up 600% and 900% in the Last Decade
summary: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway has nearly 23% of its portfolio invested in two artificial intelligence stocks, Apple and Amazon.  Apple’s foray into AI has yielded disappointing results, but opening its large language models to developers could help the company monetize the technology.  Amazon is deploying AI tools and products across its retail and cloud computing businesses, and Morgan Stanley views the company as an underappreciated leader.

Amazon is deploying AI tools and products across its retail and cloud computing businesses, and Morgan Stanley views the company as an underappreciated leader.

headline: 3 Brilliant Growth Stocks to Buy Now and Hold for the Long Term
summary: Amazon, Celsius, and Roku have long-term potential that investors should consider, although one of these may be riskier than the other two.  By contrast, investors who know how to analyze businesses can make reasonable assumptions about the future.  In other words, by focusing on long-term business fundamentals, investors can better anticipate upward stock moves.
